analysis_goals.hypothesis: Electronics category generates the highest revenue and shows consistent growth
analysis_goals.question: What are the revenue trends by product category over time?
analysis_goals.success_criteria: Clear visualization of revenue trends with statistical significance testing

analysis_goals.hypothesis: North and West regions outperform others due to higher population density
analysis_goals.question: Which regions show the strongest performance and growth potential?
analysis_goals.success_criteria: Identify top 2 regions with growth rate analysis

analysis_goals.hypothesis: Higher discounts correlate with increased order volume but lower profit margins
analysis_goals.question: What is the impact of discounts on revenue and order volume?
analysis_goals.success_criteria: Quantify the relationship between discount rates and key metrics

project.description: Example e-commerce sales analysis project demonstrating span's data analysis capabilities with CSV data

metrics.description: Sum of all revenue across all transactions
metrics.name: Total Revenue

project.name: span-example-ecommerce-analysis
